metadata.title: Web Maintenance Tenerife | End Your "Abandoned Website" (WPO 90+)
metadata.description: Is your website abandoned? ðŸš€ I offer Web Maintenance in Tenerife with real support (WPO 90+). It doesn't just 'work'; it achieves your goals.

copy.h1_lead: This is for you, the "frustrated" owner. If you feel alone and your current site is a 'broken product,' you've come to the right place. I don't abandon you. My work begins where others' ends.

heroVisual.title: Your Digital Partner
heroVisual.subtitle: Always watching out for your success

problema.title: Did they deliver the web and disappear?
problema.content: We know the story. It cost you a fortune, they gave you the keys, and Poof! The developer vanished. Now you have an 'abandoned website': slow, outdated, full of errors, and you're afraid to even touch it. And the worst part: it doesn't bring you a single customer. My brand does NOT represent that.

diferencia.title: The Difference: A "Digital Partner" vs. a "Vendor"

wpo.title: Speed Proof: My Maintenance REALLY Works (WPO 90+)
wpo.content: Cheap talk! Not at all. My own website has a WPO (speed) score of 90+. That's the proof. Professional maintenance isn't just 'updating plugins'; it's keeping your website ultra-fast and secure, like a fortress.

chart.title: Real Comparison
chart.summary: +87% faster than local competition

promesa.title: My Promise: Focus on Goals, not just "Being Online"
promesa.content: You pay most people to keep the site 'running'. You pay me to 'achieve goals'. I'll be 'behind the scenes' analyzing if people are filling out forms, if they're calling, if the strategy is working... and if not, we change it. I'm 'stubborn' about getting results.

featureCards.title: Focus on Results
featureCards.description: If it's not working, we change it

incluye.title: What does this Professional Web Support in Tenerife include?
incluye.content: This isn't just 'updating my website'. The Essential Web Maintenance (our base at â‚¬40/month) includes:

featureCards.title: Domain & SSL Management
featureCards.description: We handle renewals and security so you don't have to.

featureCards.title: Hosting Support & Backups
featureCards.description: Your site on a fast server with daily backups. Total peace of mind.

featureCards.title: Uptime Monitoring
featureCards.description: We watch 24/7 to ensure your site never goes down. If something happens, I'm the first to know.

featureCards.title: Basic Metrics Analysis
featureCards.description: I proactively review your metrics to readjust the strategy if necessary.

featureCards.title: Your Digital Partner
featureCards.description: The peace of mind of having an expert by your side, focused on your goals.

packs.title: Choose Your Level of Peace of Mind (Our Packs)
packs.content: Basic maintenance is the foundation. But if you also want us to manage your reputation, write your blog, or send you analytics reports, we have the Packs. Comprehensive solutions at a reduced price.

ctaFinal.title: Ready to forget the "Abandoned Website"?
ctaFinal.content: Let's talk. Tell me what frustrates you about your current site, and let's design the solution together. No beating around the bush. No abandonments.
ctaFinal.subtext: Your success is my success. I don't abandon you.
